response.overview: La mémoire courte is a French documentary film first released in 1963, directed by Henri Torrent. The film was scored by Alain Romans. It stars Jean Négroni, Michel Puterflam and Philippe Dominique. It has also been released under the title: The Short Memory.  It is a black and white film and runs to 1 hour and 30 minutes.
response.tagline: The Occupation: everything that you lived, forgotten and ignored!
response.title: La memoire courte (Short Memory)
